page.title: 06Hellesdon's Leisure & Clubs
page.content: There are wide ranging leisure activities,due to the areas residential nature.Youth clubs include: Scout and Cub troops,brownies and guides,boys football clubs, netball teams.There are discos and youth clubs also. For older people there are various events held at the community centres eg.Bingo,O.A.P.s meet for tea and a chat. There are specialist groups eg aircraft spotters, Badminton,Bowls, Cricket and Cycling clubs are all to be found in the area. Dancing clubs are popular. There are many groups representing the major political parties.Also there are clubs specially for women eg.Ladies Guild,Mothers Union, Trefoil Guild, Weight Watchers club,Wives Fellowship,Womens Institute. For the many mothers there are Mother-Craft,Mother and Toddler playgroups are very frequent.
